characterDescription.skinTone: fair skin with cool pink undertones, slight redness on the cheeks and around the nose
characterDescription.eyeColor: bright light blue eyes, almost a sky blue color, with a slightly darker blue limbal ring
characterDescription.eyeShape: almond-shaped eyes, slightly hooded eyelids with moderate epicanthic folds
characterDescription.hairColor: dark auburn brown with subtle lighter reddish-brown highlights, especially near the face
characterDescription.hairTexture: slightly wavy hair with loose spiral curls, fine strands
characterDescription.hairStyle: hair is styled in two high buns on either side of the head, secured with pink and white pom pom hair clips, with some loose strands framing the face
characterDescription.faceShape: round face with full cheeks and a soft, rounded jawline
characterDescription.nose: small, slightly upturned nose with a rounded tip and subtle bridge
characterDescription.lips: naturally pink lips, with a slightly fuller bottom lip and a defined cupid's bow
characterDescription.smile: a slight frown or a closed-mouth serious expression
characterDescription.eyebrows: medium-thick, dark brown eyebrows with a slightly arched shape, well-defined and slightly tapered towards the outer corners
characterDescription.ears: medium-sized ears, with defined lobes, positioned relatively close to the head
characterDescription.cheeks: full, round cheeks with slight natural rosiness
characterDescription.facialProportions: balanced facial proportions, with large, expressive eyes that are a prominent feature
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: very faint freckles across the bridge of her nose, some very fine, almost invisible downy hair on the upper lip, slightly darker circles under eyes
characterDescription.overallImpression: sweet, slightly serious appearance, with delicate features and a youthful look
characterDescription.fullDescription: This 5-6 year old girl has fair skin with cool pink undertones and bright, light sky-blue, almond-shaped eyes with slight epicanthic folds. Her dark auburn brown hair is styled in two high buns secured with pink and white pom pom clips, with a few loose wavy strands framing her round face. She has a small, slightly upturned nose, naturally pink lips, and medium-thick, arched dark brown eyebrows. This child also has very faint freckles across the bridge of her nose, darker circles under her eyes, and downy hair on her upper lip. The combined details create a sweet, somewhat serious and unique appearance.
